column1: | frances jo henderson riley. born: october 25
column3: 2015. local florists send gifts frances jo henderson riley passed from this life tuesday morning june 9
column4: 2015. graveside side services will be at shamrock cemetery friday june 12th
column5: 2015 at 10:30 a. m. memorial services will be at neil chapel on carillon campus
column7: tx at 1:30 p. m. on saturday june 13th
column8: 2015. arrangements are by robertson funeral directors of shamrock. frances was born october 25th
column9: 1929 to parents acie and dona teakell henderson. she graduated from shamrock high school in 1947. she attended frank phillips college and amarillo college. she worked at southwestern public service for 36 years
column10: retiring in 1990. she resided in amarillo texas until 2011
column11: moving to lubbock to be near family. frances enjoyed spending time with family and friends in many activities ranging from attending the national finals rodeo in las vegas
column13: hot air ballooning across the great plains to spending time at the cabin in ute park new mexico. she survived by sister mary prosser (mike)
column18: grandniece cherolyn hallett and children david michael
column20: codee and kayla. she was a member of the church of church. memorials may be sent to high plains children's home
